metadata.title: CVE-2015-1852 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The s3_token middleware in OpenStack keystonemiddleware before 1.6.0 andpython-keystoneclient before 1.4.0 disables certification verification whenthe "insecure" option is set in a paste configuration (paste.ini) fileregardless of the value, which allows remote attackers to conductman-in-the-middle attacks via a crafted certificate, a differentvulnerability than CVE-2014-7144.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1852` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-keystoneclient - 1:0.7.1-ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-keystoneclient package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:0.7.1-ubuntu1.2').
